articles.author: Sanjeev Choudhary
articles.title: Russia becomes India’s 2nd-largest crude supplier - Economic Times
articles.description: Russias share in the Indian crude market may rise further if the European Union keeps its promise of banning Russian crude imports from December. Discounts on Russian crude are expected to rise with fewer buyers in the market.
articles.content: Indias September imports of Russian oil rose 18.5% from August after falling for two months, making it the countrys second-largest crude supplier after Saudi Arabia, according to energy cargo tracker… [+2523 chars]

articles.title: Ukraine rains fire on retreating Russians - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukraine’s battlefield successes are promoting a rising chorus of nuclear threats from Moscow.
articles.content:

articles.title: Sweden sends diving vessel to probe leaking Nord Stream pipelines - Reuters
articles.description: Sweden sent a diving vessel on Monday to the site of Russian gas pipelines in the Baltic Sea that ruptured last week following blasts in the area, to probe an incident that has added new tension to Europe's energy crisis.
articles.content: STOCKHOLM/OSLO, Oct 3 (Reuters) - Sweden sent a diving vessel on Monday to the site of Russian gas pipelines in the Baltic Sea that ruptured last week following blasts in the area, to probe an incide… [+4724 chars]

articles.title: Concerns over record levels of Bird Flu as millions of birds are culled - Limerick Live
